body: Hi Cheney, I added your idea to LB sunrise/sunset. It works with IsSunUp output which is a list of 0 and 1 which also works as boolean pattern. 0 means the sun is down, 1 means the sun is up. The idea comes from Chris. Now, I should think how to connect it to LB sun path. If you look well, LB sun path does not append outputs when the sun is down, whilst isSunUp output of LB sunrise/sunset works for all the hours you connect obviously. here for you, a couple of images: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/TkRyGB8XlNCWWnxVio7FR40GTW2uxteLlSsiSgIO9bfT9dW*EtgqB7x1IpDasspCFLdDfRGc5g6nn57BEzFqpv3X35gofFFG/shift_0.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/TkRyGB8XlNBbHlQreSkcw7k2KWhI8gQUyH9dDOEOh77PV10J1dIKw8Dl5mLzxPfw92HyDlKz8QA7ZImuEWY9UQlKo0Dhu*Bn/shift_3.png) Meanwhile you can try the updated version of the component in the attached file. Hi Mostapha, During my tests I noted this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/TkRyGB8XlNBRh*ePQ1befB-aNIBmdhHZGbfrtRWSmvirBQabQbFBVBe7rq8VEh3ph3zldbAB5T4kKJYqW0ljSVzmLBCzrNuF/sunpath_question.png) Yellow: LB sun path Blue: LB sunrise/sunset Could it be related to the question you have discussed here? [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/1-hour-miss...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/1-hour-missing-ladybug?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1515958&xg_source=msg_com_gr_forum) Best Antonello
